record.title: EVENT FOR SENATORS AND SPOUSES
record.narrative:
EVENT FOR SENATORS AND SPOUSES -- (Senate - November 01, 2007)

[Page: S13713]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, there will be no vote on Monday. I remind everyone we do have an event--and people have spent a lot of time on this event--for Senators and their spouses Monday night. I would hope people would be considerate and keep that in mind. People have gone to a lot of trouble for that event, and I hope people will not let this no-vote day that is relatively new on the horizon stand in the way of attending this event and disappointing a lot of people who have worked hard to make this event for the spouses of Members. We do not get together that often. It will be a very nice evening for all of us.
